title: Twisted Treeline
body: I just patched and twisted treeline queue doesn't give any options to play and I cannot look at my ranked stats anymore...

replies.body: Servers were just coming back online from maintenance, so not everything may have been activated yet.  Everything should be okay now!

You guys really need to do something about people using bots on 3s to farm ip and masteries this is really getting out of hand and it really makes me not even want to play your game anymore because of it. i know you guys dont care about twisted treeline very much but there are players who only play that map and this is making it so that we are always 1v3 or even 3v1 and it makes it so unfair and not fun for people. seriously i think its time that you guys got this problem addressed
